verses.text: Crown him with many crowns, The Lamb upon his throne; Hark! how the heav'nly anthem drowns All music but its own.
Crown him the Lord of love; Behold his hands and side, Rich wounds, yet visible above, In beauty glorified.
Crown him the Lord of years, The Potentate of time, Creator of the rolling spheres, Ineffably sublime.
Crown him the Lord of lords, Who over all doth reign, Who once on earth, the incarnate Word, For ransomed sinners slain.
